page.title: 14LIDEN CENTRE IN EAST SWINDON
page.content: Liden is a big place ,it has a lot of trees and a lot of houses.It has a junior school with over 400 children and 15 teachers.There are 3 huge blocks of flats,5 subways and 3 shops under one roof:-a{newsagents},a {grocers}and a{chip shop}.There is a {Post Office}in the newsagents and the grocer rents{videos}.There is a super pub called the Liden Arms that does a great{Lasagne Verde}.There is a {Community Centre},an old peoples home,a {library}and an{Ecumenical Church. The Liden schools have 2 main buildings and 12 classes in tatty {mobiles.
